page.title: 11A MINSTERLEY GIRL'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock, have my {breakfast}& go to{school.}We have assembly to begin the day.After a busy day at school Mum picks me up & we go {swimming}at Pontesbury pool. My Mum teaches swimming. There are 4 groups- Shrimps, Minnows, Mackerel & Sharks. I am in Sharks.We get home at 6 p.m., have our tea & get changed. Afterwards I go to watch my Mum play{rounders. She plays for Snailbeach W.I.They have a very good team & have won two medals lately. In September they are going to represent the county in Oxfordshire. After rounders I go home, have my {supper}& wearily{go to bed.
